ygData.subject: Re: Feign Pulling Yet Again
ygData.msgSnippet: Im in Najena with a group of 20 s now. My exp has been that if the green pets dont jump you then youll want to make it deep in where there are many safe places
ygData.messageBody:
Im in Najena with a group of 20's now. My exp has been that if the green
pets dont jump you then youll want to make it deep in where there are many
safe places to setup and pull to. We like to setup by the ogre guard camp
fire near where the undead frogloks. We then camp that room and pull the
goblin wizards from around the way. If you go the other way towards
bonecrusher etc. instead of going lft into his room go rihgt and down the
hall and then take the T left. There are 2 magicians in there and 1 ogre
officer which is good to gang up on etc. Then you can stay there and camp
from there. Hope this helps.

> > Is there ANY way to separate mobs that stack one on top the other? I was
>in
> > Najena today trying to pull the Ogre Captain. I'd hit him and run back
>out
> > of the room. He would come along with one of his officers. But they were
> > directly on top of each other and they would consistently leave
>together.
> > What am I doing wrong?
> >
>I'm actually camped outside of najena. I went in with a group of 4 (lvls
>18-21). Could anyone give any pointers to fighting in this dungeon? we
>mainly just fought the ogre guards, and cleaned up some trains that people
>brought to the zone line. (one guy trained bonecrusher, and following
>along were 2 inkie necro's, their pets, and several oger guards).
>
>we wanted to go in further, but kept getting jumped by green pets, and
>elementals that gave no exp, but hurt really bad when you hit them.
>
>any specific class you want to group with here? any good buffs to protect
>agianst fire?
>
>-dj
